description:
The most successful companies in the world are not slaves to conventional sales and marketing tactics, they understand the irrefutable value of a strong Brand, and the key to enhancing it over time.

The most valuable asset you have as a Business Owner is your BRAND.

Brand Business will help you to:-
  • understand the power of Branding
  • clarify the difference between a Personal and Business Brand
  • identify a unique Brand for your Business
  • write an awe-inspiring Brand Story
  • uncover your niche market
  • Perfect your pitch to unlock resources
  • decipher your "Look and Feel."
  • Brand your website
  • Combine the magic of Brand with Mission and Culture.

This course is designed for Business Owners, whether their Business is well established or start-up. It is relevant whether you have a team of staff or you work as a one-person solopreneur.

Brand Business is delivered over 11 lectures via 95 minutes of video instruction.

It also includes a Workbook designed to draw out the unique and powerful fundamentals of your Brand, so you can identify with it, use it, share it, and ultimately grow your Business.
title: Brand Business: Build Your Greatest Asset
